item.name: IMG_SRC
item.help: This needs to be accessible by the web browser at runtime, so consider using $$LIBRARY_CONTEXTPATH$ for component-only images

item.name: IMG_ALT_TEXT
item.help: Alternative text should present the content and function of the image and be succinct. For decorative images, leave blank.

item.name: IMG_HEIGHT
item.typeValue: REGEXP#-1#[1-9][0-9]* *(px|%)?#specify number or number px or number %

item.name: IMG_WIDTH
item.typeValue: REGEXP#-1#[1-9][0-9]* *(px|%)?#specify number or number px or number %

item.name: PLAYCOUNT
item.typeValue: REGEXP#-1#^[0-9]{0,2}$|^(100)$#Please enter a value between 0 and 100

item.name: VOLUME
item.typeValue: REGEXP#-1#^[0-9]{0,2}$|^(100)$#Please enter a value between 0 and 100

item.prompt: Data Item With Name of Contact:

item.name: l2
item.prompt: These data items can hold multiple values as a comma separated list. The position of the value in the list corresponds to a type - 'home', 'mobile', 'work', 'other'

item.help: Comma separated list

item.help: Comma separated list

item.help: Comma separated list

item.name: DI_NOTE

item.name: SuccessMessage
item.help: Leave empty for no success notification

item.name: ErrorMessage
item.help: Leave empty for no error notification

item.name: l2
item.prompt: These data items, if specified, must be used in a nested table with in the main contacts table. If they are not, then a security exception will be thrown if the item is populated.

item.prompt: This widget requires the custom Cordova plugin openFileInExternalViewer.

item.name: l2
item.prompt: The plugin is embedded in the product widget, at the location

item.name: l4
item.prompt: You can also copy the plugin into your project, for example into $$PROJECT_HOME$/cordovaPlugins, and import it from there.

item.name: l5
item.prompt: The Cordova plugins are configured from Developer IDE, menu Project->Properties, tab "Additional Cordova Plugins".
